person.persName: Mary A. J. Cartwright Wadlington (Princeton, Kentucky, governess)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, governess. Kentucky native. Married to James A. Cartwright. Married to Thomas B. Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1850. Mother of Thomas Wadlington, Mary Wadlington, and Ann Wadlington. Resident of Caldwell County in 1850. Employed Lewis Brown as a farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Family governess in Princeton in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons (including Jourdan and John) in Caldwell County in 1860.
